product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Classic Platinum Stand Up Paddleboard - 11' 6"
long_description: Perfect for flatwater and light surf, the Bic Sport ACE-TEC Classic Platinum 11 ft. 6 in. Stand Up Paddleboard offers width, volume and stability geared toward beginners and large paddlers. With a weight capacity of 250 lbs., the 11 ft. 6 in. length handles nicely and tracks well in flatwater. The 11 ft. 6 in. length is also a great choice for multiple users-high stability means everyone can have a fun time. Balanced rocker design and longboard-style outline offer excellent handling on flatwater and easy maneuverability in waves and light surf. EPS foam core wrapped with an epoxy resin/fiberglass cloth is encased in a styrene polymer outer shell; construction offers lightweight durability. Multiaxial fiberglass cloth distributes weight in multiple directions in the board, offering excellent stiffness and low weight. Padded deck supplies reliable wax-free traction when paddling in the standing or kneeling position, and it increases comfort on long paddles. 10-in. single fin promotes straight tracking in the water. FCS fin features injection-molded construction and a specialized structure on the inside face of the fin that reduces drag and enhances performance. Carry handle allows you to curve fingers inside for easy grip; the Bic Sport ACE-TEC Classic Platinum 11 ft. 6 in. Stand Up Paddleboard weighs 30 lbs.
short_description: Perfect for flatwater and light surf, the Bic Sport ACE-TEC Classic Platinum 11 ft. 6 in. Stand Up Paddleboard offers width, volume and stability geared toward beginners and large paddlers.
